img_above_text:
The Pool of Shattered Jade Shrine can be found here, along with a **Meditation Spot** in the middle of the pool.
The Carvings, Pool of Shattered Jade Meditation Spot
img_below_text:
Grab the green Wisp on this side of the broken bridge, and then look past the Shrine for a small passageway full of -- you guessed it -- hanging cocoons.
![Wukong UpperHollow 35.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/47/Wukong_UpperHollow_35.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong" where the player character stands before a dark, web-filled passageway with hanging cocoons. This area is located past the Pool of Shattered Jade Shrine and is part of the Upper Hollow Walkthrough. The player is about to explore a small passageway filled with hanging cocoons, indicating a potentially dangerous or significant area in the game.
